results.title: EXPRESS: Metformin; Its Salutary Effects Beyond Diabetes Mellitus.
results.text_hl: The goal of this review is to assess the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@), but more importantly its effects on disease states other than @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@.

results.title: Serum lipoprotein(a), and plasminogen activator inhibitor-1 in uncomplicated type 2 diabetes mellitus: a case-control study
results.text_hl: Early investigations with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ showed an increase in overall fibrinolytic activity in those with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, @DISEASE_Peripheral_Vascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D016491 @@@peripheral vascular disease@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@coronary artery disease@@@.

results.title: Interaction Between Type 2 Diabetes Prevention Strategies and Genetic Determinants of Coronary Artery Disease on Cardiometabolic Risk Factors
results.text_hl: Participants in both the lifestyle and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ interventions had greater improvement in the majority of recognized CRFs compared with placebo (P < 0.001) irrespective of @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ genetic risk (Pinteraction > 0.05).

results.title: Involvement of Expression of miR33-5p and ABCA1 in Human Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells in Coronary Artery Disease.
results.text_hl: Downregulation of miR-33a-5p and upregulation of @GENE_ABCA1 @GENE_19 @@@ABCA1@@@ were linked to a lower @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ risk. @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@Atorvastatin@@@ upregulated @GENE_ABCA1 @GENE_19 @@@ABCA1@@@ mRNA, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ downregulated miR-26a-5p in @<m>DISEASE_Coronary_Artery_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003324 @@@CAD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
